argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_qcn | |- ( A e. QQ -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sqval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( A x. A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. QQ -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( A x. A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_qmulcl | |- ( ( A e. QQ /\ A e. QQ ) -> ( A x. A ) e. QQ ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anidms | |- ( A e. QQ -> ( A x. A ) e. QQ ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. QQ -> ( A ^ 2 ) e. QQ ) |
